data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Saharanpur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 38,130 believers in the county of Saharanpur into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Saharanpur are far from Jesus.
Father, give the disciples of the the county of Saharanpur an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jat Dhankar people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, the believers in the county of Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Saharanpur to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, teach the 38,130 believers in Saharanpur that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Saharanpur
location.people_groups_list: Gadaria (Muslim traditions), Rajbhar, Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions), Gadaria Dhingar, Rajput (Muslim traditions)
